rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area designed in traditional Kerala style with stone cladding and woodwork. It serves as a transitional space.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area (with integrated kitchen)
rooms.description: An open-plan space combining the living area, dining room, and kitchen. The kitchen area includes storage and prep counters adhering to Vastu principles by aligning workstations with auspicious directions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed for relaxation and privacy. The placement ensures that the bed is in the south-east direction to enhance prosperity, following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with natural light and ventilation. Placed strategically according to Vastu for harmonious energy distribution.

rooms.name: Family Room/Study
rooms.description: Multi-purpose space serving as a family area or study. Designed with adequate seating and lighting for daily activities.

openings.location: Living & Dining Area facing east for natural light and energy flow.
